body:
Comment 1: 
Part of this by design: goimports also includes policy on grouping imports (which
happens to be the Go team's and Google's style guide), where third-party stuff goes in
its own block, with a blank line before.

The bug here is that the blank line is being omitted in the goimports case.
_Labels changed: added **repo-tools**._ _Status changed to **Accepted**._
